amendment.description: An amendment numbered 142 printed in House Report 115-297 to Increases funding for HRSA's Geriatrics Workforce Enhancement Program by $4 million, consistent with the current enacted level of funding, and decreases funding for the Office of the Secretary of the HHS by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A131) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A131) offered by Ms. Meng.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A131) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
